think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the effective_cache_size knob in PostgreSQL, which indicates the amount of memory available for caching data. 2. Determine if this knob has any special values that alter its functionality significantly. 3. Check if there are specific values like -1 or 0 that would disable or change the behavior of the knob. 4. Conclude whether the knob behaves normally with a range of numerical values or if it has special cases that classify it as a special knob.
